form.title: Build a controller
form.overview: This form allows you to input the basic information needed to build a controller class for your module. Fill in the information required and click the Generate button.

item.name: modulecode
item.label: Module code
item.description: Provide the input of the module code.

item.name: modulename
item.label: Module name
item.description: Provide the name of the module that you are generating as you wish it to appear on menus and in the module catalogue.

item.name: moduledescription
item.label: Module description
item.description: Provide description of the module that you are generating as you wish it to appear in the module catalogue. Please do not use place holder text, rather provide a full description that users can understand.

item.name: copyright
item.label: Copyright holder
item.description: Provide the name of the copyright holder of the name that you are generating.
